1 What is Testing?

* Software testing is a set of acivities to discover defects and evaluate the quality of softwar artifats. These artifacts, when being tested, are known as test objects.

* A common miconception about testing is that it only consists of executing tests.

* ANotther commonn misconceptiion bout testing is that testting focuses entirely on verifying the test object.

* Testing may be dynamic or static.
